sentences.sContent: planes delivering precious supplies of medicine and food
sentences.sCn: 运送药品、食品等宝贵物资的飞机
我们星球上的宝贵资源

sentences.sContent: ...whose shelves house our most precious memories as well as our lifetime’s knowledge...
...Genuine criticism creates a precious opening for an author to become better on his own terms--a process that is often extremely painful...
...And because demand for this precious resource will grow...
...is the most effective use of precious institutional dollars...

synos.tran: 宝贵的；珍贵的；矫揉造作的

remMethod.val: preci(价值) ＋ ous(…的) → 有价值的 → 珍贵的， 宝贵的

words.tran: 昂贵地；仔细地；过分讲究地

trans.tranOther: something that is precious is valuable and important and should not be wasted or used without care
